info.name: Criticker dark/elegant (v.Alpha)
info.description: I use a lot Criticker but my eyes hurt each time I used it at night. My dark mode ad-don on Mozilla was making me lost the colors of the ratings so I decided to do one for myself.
info.additionalInfo:
v.Alpha

-It has all functionalities but there are some things that either I do not know how to change or after a couples of days I could not find the way to do it. So expect maybe to somethings to change—minor changes—, although they are not that disturbing or eye killers.

11 august 2018
-Cosmetic changes: color of the rating box, review... for better visibility.

16 February 2018
-When submitting movies the plot was unreadable, now fixed;
-The quip on some levels was almost unreadable, now fixed.

10 February 2018
-On the PSIs some numbers, from 60 more or less, were not well seeing, I have change that.
